extension.description: Playful rubber duck debugging prompts to help you think out loud.
view.container.title: Rubber Duck
view.panel.title: Duck Panel
command.openDuckPanel: Rubber Duck Copilot: Open Duck Panel
command.resetSessionCount: Rubber Duck Copilot: Reset Session Count
configuration.title: Rubber Duck Copilot
configuration.enabled.description: Enable or disable Rubber Duck Copilot.
configuration.triggerOnSave.description: Show prompts when files are saved.
configuration.triggerOnErrors.descriptio: Show prompts when the active file has errors.
configuration.maxPromptsPerSession.descr: Maximum prompts per VS Code session.
